name: Shoot The Alien
description:
Hi

Thanks so much for supporting my game!!

This is an early access build of a shooter I'm working on.

Its the first of 3 chapters.

The game should run fine, however some art assets are not the final version.

Please let me know if you have any issues.

Any feedback on the direction or pacing of the game would also be really apprecaited

Again thanks so much for playing
